snippet.title: Air Guitar Warrior Gamepad Edition - GAMEPLAY TRAILER
snippet.description:
Air Guitar Warrior Gamepad Edition is a rhythm shooter where you control the music. Tap buttons in rhythm to change fire modes and play the lead guitar on the soundtrack. Includes 19 custom-made tracks by Mika Tyyskä / Mr. Fastfinger and Samppa Siurala - with 5 layers of lead guitar on every track. Enter a state of zen flow as you blast enemies and make music at the same time!

Out now Xbox One - http://airguitarwarrior.com/gamepad
